dsl_rule: IMPLIES(AND(GE(field1, 0), GE(field2, 0)), AND(LT(field2, field1), MOD(field1, 4)==0, MOD(field2, 4)==0))
notes: The rule is derived from the evidence that both nrofRBs and startingRB are configured as integer multiples of 4 RBs and startingRB is less than nrofRBs.

meta.evidence:
where f(i) is the bit number of the i^{\text {th }} bit in the bitmap set to one, repeated across every [1 / \rho] of the resource blocks configured for CSI-RS reception by the UE. The starting position and number of the resource blocks in which the UE shall assume that CSI-RS is transmitted are given by the higher-layer parameters freqBand and density in the CSI-RSResourceMapping [E for the bandwidth part given by the higher-layer parameter BWP-Id in the CSI-ResourceConfig IE or given by the higher-layer parameters nrofPRBs in the CSI-RS-CellMobility [E where the the startPRB given by csi r s -Measurement B W is relative to common resource block 0 . For NZP CSI-RS configured by TRS-ResourceSet [E, the starting position and number of the resource blocks in which the CSI-RS can be transmitted are given by the higherlayer parameters nrofRBs, and startingRB in the TRS-ResourceSet [E, where startingRB is relative to common resource block 0 and the density \rho=3 .
---
The band width and initial common resource block (CRB) index of a CSI-RS resource within a BWP, as defined in Clause 7.4.1.5 of [4, TS 38.211], are determined based on the higher layer parameters nrofRBs and startingRB, respectively, within the CSI-FrequencyOccupation IE configured by the higher layer parameter freqBand within the CSI-RS-ResourceMapping [E. Both nrofRBs and startingRB are configured as integer multiples of 4 RBs , and the reference point for starting R B is CRB 0 on the common resource block grid. If starting R B<N_{B W P}^{\text {start }} , the UE shall assume that the initial CRB index of the CSI-RS resource is N_{\text {initial } R B}=N_{B W P}^{\text {start }} , otherwise N_{\text {initial } R B}= startingRB. If nrofRBs >N_{B W P}^{\text {size }}+N_{B W P}^{\text {start }}-N_{\text {initial RB }} , the UE shall assume that the bandwidth of the CSI-RS resource is N_{C S I-R S}^{B W}=N_{B W P}^{\text {size }}+N_{B W P}^{\text {start }}-N_{\text {initial } R B} , otherwise N_{C S I-R S}^{B W}=n r o f R B s . In all cases, the UE shall expect that N_{\text {CSI-RS }}^{B W} \geq \min \left(24, N_{B W P}^{\text {size }}\right) .

full_api_response.dsl: IMPLIES(AND(GE(field1, 0), GE(field2, 0)), AND(LT(field2, field1), MOD(field1, 4)==0, MOD(field2, 4)==0))
full_api_response.notes: The rule is derived from the evidence that both nrofRBs and startingRB are configured as integer multiples of 4 RBs and startingRB is less than nrofRBs.
